entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 9.
